titles.title: Prescription Drug Retail Price Disclosure Act
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that each prescription drug sold at retail bear a label that states the full retail price of the drug.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 12/8/2003--Introduced. Prescription Drug Retail Price Disclosure Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require prescription drug labels to state a drug's full retail price (the price absent discount, insurance, or public health benefit payments).
